appStages.name: Introduction
Video Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eVideo Summarization and QnA\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload a video file and choose an option to interact with it, a summary will be generated or a relevant query can be answered. \u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload a Video",
      "description": "Upload any video file you would like to summarize or ask queries about",
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "validate": {
        "required": true
      },
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Destination Path",
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "/data/GENAI/Video-Summarize-And-QnA/Uploads",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "destinationPath",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded btn-outline mr-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "upload",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Select an Action",
      "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
      "customClass": "border p-4 rounded m-4",
      "inline": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "defaultValue": 0,
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "Summarize ",
          "value": "0",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "QnA",
          "value": "1",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "validate": {
        "required": true
      },
      "key": "option",
      "type": "radio",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Summarize",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded mr-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "submit1",
              "conditional": {
                "show": false,
                "when": "option",
                "eq": "1"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "conditional": {
        "show": false,
        "when": "option",
        "eq": "2"
      },
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Ask a question",
      "description": "Any query related to the video",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": true,
      "validate": {
        "required": true
      },
      "key": "question",
      "conditional": {
        "show": true,
        "when": "option",
        "eq": "1"
      },
      "type": "textarea",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,

          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",

              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded mr-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "submit2",
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "option",
                "eq": "1"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true

          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
